summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 2.9°C) and outside temperature (down 2.0°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 801 m) and light levels (up 11889 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 13879 lux), cloud levels (up 1498 m), feels like temperature (up 4.9°C), and outside temperature (up 3.6°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 801.3m lower than yesterday, 608.1m lower than the past week, 1498.3m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 745m minimum and 3580m maximum, with an average of 1185.1m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 1793.2m and 2680m.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; mild temperatures are expected. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced. Possible light showers, occasional overcast conditions, and overcast conditions will limit sunlight. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
